bullets: Designed and built a centralized digital menu display system enabling real-time content updates.
Developed food waste tracking and forecasting tools to analyze consumption patterns.
Led website updates following a brand re-launch, improving SEO structure, page performance, and user experience.
Automated blog publishing and marketing workflows using WordPress and custom scripts.
Designed and taught an accredited, project-based geometry course aligned with state and institutional standards.
Applied mastery-based assessment techniques to track student progress and ensure conceptual understanding.
Developed a Python-based data analysis toolkit to automatically generate key metrics and visualizations.
Improved data processing efficiency by standardizing analysis workflows and reusable components.
